actions.name: Teravolt
actions.description: Effect: The user's attacks are unaffected by the abilities of other creatures on the field.

actions.name: Teravolt (Fusion Bolt)

cost.trigger: The user hits a target with Fusion Bolt.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user hits a target with Fusion Bolt.

The target gains @Affliction[nullified] 5.

actions.name: Teravolt (Bolt Strike)

cost.trigger: The user hits a target with Bolt Strike.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user hits a target with Bolt Strike.

The target gains @Affliction[nullified] 5 and loses -1 ACC Stage for 5 Activations.

system.description: Effect: The user's attacks are unaffected by the abilities of other creatures on the field. When using Fusion Bolt, the user may spend an additional 2 PP to also inflict @Affliction[nullified] 5 on one of a target's abilities. When using Bolt Strike, the user may spend an additional 3 PP to inflict @Affliction[nullified] 5 on one of a target's abilities and have it lose -1 ACC Stage for 5 Activations.
